translation.en: GIRL 1: Today's the day. GIRL 2: All right. GIRL 3: I feel good about this one.
translation.zh:
-就是今天了.
-好.我对这次感觉很好.

translation.en: GIRL 1: Us three witches are fire.
translation.zh:
我们三个是惊人女巫. -我不明白为何不找第四位就一直尝试.
-她又来了.

translation.en: GIRL 2: I don't know why we keep trying without a fourth. GIRL 1: Oh, here she goes.
translation.zh:
-我不明白为何不找第四位就一直尝试.
-她又来了.

translation.en: GIRL 2: What? It's been two years. GIRL 1: Maybe we don't need a fourth.
translation.zh:
-什么?已经两年了.
-也许我们不需要第四个人.

translation.en: GIRL 2: Yeah, you need all four.
Each crescent moon is an element. See? North, south, east, west.
translation.zh:
每个新月都是一个元素.
看到吗?北,南,东,西.

translation.en: GIRL 3: I wanna freeze time. GIRL 1: We couldn't freeze time if we had a fourth.
translation.zh:
-我想冻结时间.
-就算有了第四位也无法冻结时间.

translation.en: I have it on the table, Frankie.
translation.zh: 我把它放在桌上了,弗兰琪.

translation.en: You need to hold it, or else you're gonna light something on fire.
translation.zh: 你必须握着,不然你会让某些东西着火.

translation.en: Don't put it out. I have to. We have to do the ritual.
translation.zh:
-别把它灭掉.
-我必须.我们必须做仪式.

translation.en: Frankie, watch out. You're always lighting things on fire, bro.
translation.zh: 弗兰琪,小心.你总是让东西着火,兄弟.

translation.en: Not this time. GIRL 1: Y'all witches ready?
translation.zh:
-这一次不会了.
-你们准备好了?

translation.en: ALL [CHANTING]: As the night receives Your light
And the oceans feel your pull
I set my intention To grow with you
I summon the spirits of the North, spirit of earth and body,
translation.zh: 我召唤北方,地和身体的灵魂,

translation.en: I summon the spirits of the East,
spirit of air, spirit of new beginnings, spirit of breath.
translation.zh: 我召唤东方,风的灵魂, 新起点,生命力的灵魂.

translation.en: I summon the spirits of the South,
translation.zh: 我呼唤南方,火及希望的灵魂,

translation.en: spirit of fire and will, spirit of heat.
translation.zh: 我呼唤南方,火及希望的灵魂, 热力的灵魂.

translation.en: Tabby, can you just pretend you didn't summon the Southern spirits
translation.zh: 泰碧,你能不能假装你没呼唤南方的灵魂

translation.en: and do the spirits of the West?
What? No. That's whack. I already did mine.
translation.zh: 什么?不行.那是错的.我已经好了.

translation.en: Someone needs to. It's not gonna work otherwise.
translation.zh: 一定要有人呼唤.不然不会成功.

translation.en: the spirits of the West have been messin' shit up for a while now,
translation.zh: 西方的灵魂目前已经捣乱好一阵子了,

translation.en: so why don't we just leave 'em out. She's got a valid point.
translation.zh:
-那为什么不把忽略它.
-她说得有道理.

translation.en: And, look, anyways, it starts with East. East, South, West--
translation.zh: 无论如何,它始于东方.东,南,西...

translation.en: See, this is why we can only do basic magick. We've never had a fourth.
translation.zh:
好,看,所以我们只能做基本的魔术.
我们永远不会有第四个人.

translation.en: How many times have we tried to telepathically communicate?
translation.zh: 我们已尝试了多少次心灵感应式的交流?

translation.en: Oh, my God! You're obsessed with telepathically communicating.
translation.zh: 天啊!你沉迷于心灵感应式的交流.

translation.en: "So it shall be sealed and done
When all four corners Meet as one"
translation.zh: 当四个角落合而为一时"

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. You can...cry.
I get it, man. This is...
This is weird, though, isn't it?
Look it, we're having all the feels. You'll have to do my makeup when we get there.
translation.zh:
看,我们都很情绪化.
我们到了之后你得帮我化妆.

translation.en: Okay. I got you. Turn it back up, please.
How are my brows? They look great.
All right, let's do this. Okay.
I see you made it in one piece. Yeah, it's--
Is that another piece of you I see right here?
translation.zh: 那就是你的另一部分吧?

translation.en: Hi, Lily. I finally got you here.
translation.zh: 嗨,莉莉.你终于来这里了.

translation.en: It's nice to see you again.
Last time was on your turf though, so now it's my home-court advantage.
translation.zh:
上一次虽然在你的地盘上
现在这是我的主场优势.

translation.en: A metaphor, sort of like analogy. Oh, yeah. I get it.
Yeah, I get it. Dad joke. Guilty.
Thanks. HELEN: It is, isn't it?
Let's take a picture. You know? Commemorate the moment.
translation.zh: 我们来拍一张照片.纪念这一刻.

translation.en: It's not really a selfie thing, but here. Sure. How do I--?
translation.zh:
-这不是什么自拍的东西,但你拿去.
-好.我该怎么...?

translation.en: All right. Come on in and meet the boys. They're really excited to meet you.
translation.zh:
好.进来见我的孩子们.
他们迫不及待地要见你.

translation.en: Hey, give Lily the good seat. Move over.
translation.zh: 给莉莉留个好位子.走开.

translation.en: A little birdie told me mint chip was your favorite.
translation.zh: 有只小鸟告诉我薄荷片是你的最爱.

translation.en: Thanks. Isn't that right, little birdie? Mm-hm.
How you feeling about school tomorrow? Are you excited?
translation.zh: 你觉得明天上学怎么样?兴奋吗?

translation.en: You can make some new friends. Well, that would imply that I had old friends.
translation.zh:
-你可以认识新朋友.
-这意味着我有老朋友.

translation.en: There's gonna be D-bags no matter where you go, right?
translation.zh: 混混都无所不在,不是吗?

translation.en: All right. Just remember what I always tell you.
translation.zh: 好.记得我常常告诉你的.
你的不同就是你的能力.

translation.en: Okay, on that note, I'm gonna go unpack. Okay.
translation.zh: 好,关于那一点,我要去收拾了.

translation.en: Thank you for just being so cool... Mom.
I know it feels fast. Mom, I'm not judging you at all.
translation.zh:
-我知道感觉太快了.
-妈,我一点也没怪你.

translation.en: I just have not connected to someone like this for so long,
translation.zh: 我只是很久都没那么喜欢一个人,

translation.en: and, God, it just feels really good, like, you know, to have someone to...
translation.zh: 天啊,感觉非常好,就像有个人...

translation.en: All right, baby. Get some rest.
Love you, love you, love you. Love you, love you.
Have a good first day. Thanks.
translation.zh:
-祝你有个美好的第一天.
-谢谢.

translation.en: I know why the caged bird Sings, ah me
translation.zh: 我知道为什么被囚禁的鸟唱歌,我,

translation.en: When his wing is bruised And his bosom sore,--
translation.zh: 当他的翅膀受伤,胸部酸痛时...

translation.en: When he beats his bars And he would be free;
translation.zh: 当他挣脱他的牢狱,就能得自由,

translation.en: But a prayer that he sends From his heart's deep core
translation.zh: 但来自他内心深处的祷告,

translation.en: But a plea, that upward To Heaven he flings--
I know why The caged bird sings!
translation.zh: 我知道为何囚禁的鸟会唱歌!

translation.en: Okay, this week we're gonna be reading chapters one through four
translation.zh: 好,这星期我们将阅读第一至第四章

translation.en: of Maya Angelou's seminal autobiography, which draws its title--
translation.zh: 玛雅安杰卢的开创性自传,书名是...

translation.en: Ew! God, are you seeing this?
TEACHER: Okay, what's going on? TIMMY: Hey.
Hi. I think you dropped something.
translation.zh: 嘿.我想你可能掉了东西.

-真恶心.
-大家能够安静点吗?我们继续.

translation.en: Can we settle down back there, please? Let's go. Jacob.
translation.zh:
-真恶心.
-大家能够安静点吗?我们继续. -雅各.
-就像犯罪现场什么的.

translation.en: TIMMY: It's like a crime scene.
Listen. It happens to everyone. Timmy's just a dick.
translation.zh:
听着.这种事大家都有可能遇上.
提米是个混蛋.

translation.en: Seriously, don't waste your tears on him. GIRL 2: I mean, you're not alone.
translation.zh:
真的,别为他浪费眼泪.
我是说,你不是一个人.

translation.en: He's made us all cry at one point or another.
translation.zh: 他都曾让我们所有人哭过.

translation.en: your flow is heavy and that is something to celebrate.
translation.zh: 你的流量好多,这是值得庆祝的.

translation.en: What? I'm just saying. Aunt Flo's in from the Redland.
GIRL 1: We brought you some shorts.
I wore 'em in gym, so they're kinda sweaty, but they should fit you.
translation.zh:
我上体育课时穿过
有点汗,但应该适合你穿.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, I'll just slide them under the door.
translation.zh: 好.我把裤子放在门下给你.

translation.en: You can sit with us if you want.
translation.zh: 你愿意的话可以和我们一起坐.

translation.en: Not that anybody really wants to sit with us anyways.
translation.zh: 反正也没人真的要和我们一起坐.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Did he just look at you?
translation.zh:
-我的天.他刚刚看着你?
-冷静点,女孩.

translation.en: Down, girl. Frankie's been in love
translation.zh:
-我的天.他刚刚看着你?
-冷静点,女孩. 弗兰琪从五年级开始就爱上了雅各.

translation.en: with Jacob since the fifth grade.
translation.zh: 弗兰琪从五年级开始就爱上了雅各.

translation.en: Sorry, I just have really bad cramps.
Hey, we should hang out after school this week.
translation.zh: 这星期放学后你应该和我们一起玩.

translation.en: Mom! You know I can't control myself.
That's very good. Okay, okay. Show me your dance moves.
Oh...I just had to go through some paperwork for your new school, but you know me.
translation.zh:
我只需要完成你
新学校的一些文件,但你了解我.

translation.en: I put all the important shit in a shoebox, and it makes it impossible to find.
translation.zh:
我把所有重要东西
放在一个鞋盒里,让我找得好辛苦.

translation.en: Adam says he's gonna get me organized,
translation.zh:
亚当说会帮我整理
所以我把它们带到办公室去,

translation.en: so I'm taking it down to the office,
translation.zh:
亚当说会帮我整理
所以我把它们带到办公室去, 但我告诉他别期望太高,所以...

translation.en: but I told him not to get his hopes up, so...
translation.zh: 但我告诉他别期望太高,所以...

translation.en: Hey, um, thanks for washing my jeans, by the way.
translation.zh: 顺便谢谢你帮我洗了牛仔裤.

translation.en: The ones I bled through today. I didn't.
translation.zh:
-那个我今天沾到我的血的.
-我没有.

translation.en: Look who it is. Just in time for first period.
translation.zh: 看是谁来了.刚好赶上初潮.

translation.en: Timmy. You know what helps with cramps?
translation.zh:
-提米.
-知不知道什么对肚子痛有帮助?

translation.en: TEACHER: Both of you, principal's office now.
translation.zh: 你们俩,马上到校长室去.

translation.en: Ms. Schechner, who are you speaking to?
translation.zh: 谢克纳小姐,你和谁说话?

translation.en: Didn't you just call my name?
translation.zh: 你刚刚不是叫了我的名字?

translation.en: VOICE: If you can hear this, you're our fourth.
translation.zh: 如果你听得到,你是我们的第四位.

translation.en: Yes? Can I go to the bathroom?
TIMMY: You didn't get the memo?
That's good. Double detention. Anything else? For what?
translation.zh:
-很好.双倍扣留.还有吗?
-为了什么?

translation.en: Oh, shit! I told y'all haters she was the fourth!
translation.zh:
天啊!我都跟你们
这些消极的人说她是第四位!

translation.en: FRANKIE: Yes, yes, y'all! It's the motherfricking reckoning!
translation.zh: 是的,各位!这就是回报的时刻!

translation.en: I can't even believe this. We on a other, other level.
translation.zh: 我根本无法相信.我们在另一个层次.

translation.en: We sent you a message telepathically.
translation.zh: 我们通过心灵感应向你发送了一条消息.

translation.en: Yeah. Just, like, telepathically communicating with you. NBD.
translation.zh:
是的,就如通过心灵感应
和你沟通.没什么了不起.

translation.en: JK. It's, like, a VBD for sure, because now you're actually here and we on some shit IRL.
translation.zh:
开玩笑.这很重要,因为你真的来了
而我们在关注着一些事.
好.有人可以给我解释吗?

translation.en: Okay. It was a test to see if your antennas were up.
translation.zh: 好.这是一项测试,看你的天线是否能收到.

translation.en: They up! What do you mean? How?
Well, we practiced a lot of times, but we never got it quite right.
translation.zh: 我们练习了很多次,但从没正确做好.

translation.en: But, I mean, today, it was like...
translation.zh: 但是,我的意思是,今天,就像...
超级卫生棉条来救人了!

translation.en: That's you. Sorry, is it too soon?
So how long have you been practicing?

translation.zh:
-你练习多久了?
-练习? 是啊.

translation.en: Oh. No, I never, like, practiced anything before.
translation.zh: 不,我从没有,练习过什么.

translation.en: Okay, so, like, when did you start getting a sense of your gift?
translation.zh: 好,那么你什么时候开始感受到你的天赋?

translation.en: What are you guys talking about?
Take my hand. It's okay. Come with me. We're gonna learn a lot today.
translation.zh:
牵我的手.没关系.跟我来.
今天我们将学到很多东西.

translation.en: LILY: Sorry, this is all just a little new to me.
translation.zh: 抱歉,这一切对我来说有点新.

translation.en: TABBY: I mean, it's new to us too. We've never thrown a grown-ass man.
translation.zh:
对我们来说也很新.
我们从没甩过一个成年男性.

translation.en: Yeah, and, like, we all thought it at the same time.
translation.zh: 是啊,还有,我们同时都那样想.
等等,什么? 告诉我你没想过把他甩到远远的.

translation.en: Tell me you didn't think about throwing his ass off of you.
translation.zh: 告诉我你没想过把他甩到远远的.

translation.en: Yeah, I did. LOURDES: Well, so did we!
And that's just stage one, moving stuff with our minds.
translation.zh: 那只是第一阶段,用意念移动东西.

translation.en: LOURDES: Or people, I guess, in Timmy's case.
translation.zh: 或人,至少在提米的情况来说.

translation.en: If he even counts as a person. True that. Anything.
translation.zh:
-如果他算是个人的话.
-也对.随便.

translation.en: Stage two? That's what went down in detention.
translation.zh: 第二阶段?那就是被拘留时发生的事.

translation.en: That was so sick! And you said we couldn't do it.
translation.zh: 太棒了!你还说我们做不到.

translation.en: Stage three, we'll get to soon enough.
translation.zh: 第三阶段,我们很快就能体验.
虽然如此,我们来让她惊喜吧.

translation.en: You know, the power to take on a different form?
translation.zh: 那就是变成不同形体的能力?

translation.en: And if we get to stage four, I'm low-key turning myself into Kristen Stewart.
translation.zh:
如果我们达到第四阶段
我会低调变成克里斯汀斯图尔特.

translation.en: Don't judge. She's a Twilight stan.
translation.zh:
别论断.她是
暮光之城狂热粉丝.

translation.en: Point is, we've never made it past stage one.
translation.zh: 问题是,我们从未做到超过第一阶段.

translation.en: And then in walks Robert Pattinson.
translation.zh: 然后罗伯特帕丁森就走进来了.

translation.en: What? You tell me she's not giving off Edward Cullen vibes right now.
translation.zh:
什么?你试图说服我
说她现在并不像爱德华卡伦那样大气.

translation.en: I'm sorry, can you guys just slow down? I'm having a hard time catching up.
translation.zh: 抱歉,你们能不能慢下来?我很难赶上.

translation.en: Okay, well, why don't you tell us a little about you.
translation.zh: 好,不然你告诉我们关于你的部分.

translation.en: Uh...I don't really know. I've never looked into it before.
translation.zh: 我不知道.从来没有研究过它.

translation.en: She's a therapist from New Jersey.
translation.zh: 她是新泽西州的治疗师.
肯定是从某个地方遗传.

translation.en: Yeah, you see, we've been looking for our fourth for a while now.
translation.zh:
是啊,我们一直在寻找
我们的第四位好一阵子了.

translation.en: We thought we could form a coven, just us three--
translation.zh:
我们以为可以形成
一个盟约,就我们三个...

translation.en: No, because, you see, we each have an element that corresponds to a direction.
translation.zh:
不,因为我们每个人
都有一个与方向相对应的元素.

translation.en: So you've got North, South, East...
But West, that was a tough get.
Yeah, in order for us to have, like, maximum power,
translation.zh: 是啊,为了让我们拥有最大的能力,

translation.en: we all need to be on our directions.
translation.zh: 我们都需要在自己的方向上.

translation.en: This is a lot, but I am listening
and also working through a low-level panic attack.
translation.zh: 同时经历着轻度恐慌症.

translation.en: Okay, we know that this is probably a lot to take in right now.
translation.zh: 好,我们知道现在要你接受的不少.

translation.en: But you shouldn't run from your power.
translation.zh: 但你不该逃避你的能力.

translation.en: That's what my mom always says.
Give me your hand. Come on.

translation.zh: 你愿不愿意成为我们的第四位?

translation.en: Come on, I got bad knees.

translation.zh: 她的前十字韧带会撕裂.

translation.en: You had me at shape-shifting into Kristen Stewart.
translation.zh: 你说变成克里斯汀斯图尔特时就深得我心了.

translation.en: She said yes! She said yes. Oh, my God!
Why didn't you just say yes originally?
translation.zh: 你为什么一开始不答应呢?

translation.en: I mean, witchcraft in general is such a charged word.
translation.zh: 一般而言,巫术就是一个带有说服力的词.

translation.en: We literally house babies in our stomachs.
translation.zh: 实际上我们的肚子是可以装宝宝的.
那是雷德利斯科特鬼扯的.

translation.en: We have superpowers without even trying.
translation.zh: 我们不费吹灰之力就有超能力了.

translation.en: I mean, not all of us can do that, but...
translation.zh:
我是说,不是
全部人都能够那样,但是...

translation.en: Shit. You know, point taken. My bad, Lou.
Yeah, it's all good. Y'all know trans girls got our own magick anyway.
translation.zh:
没事.你们都知道变性女性
反正拥有特殊的魔力.

translation.en: That's why covens have always been so important.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么盟约一直如此重要.

translation.en: Because half the battle of having powers is believing you do.
translation.zh: 因为拥有能力一半的挣扎就是相信自己有.

translation.en: Well, now that we got our fourth, we need to take our coven for a test drive.
translation.zh:
现在我们有了第四位
需要考验一下我们的盟约.

translation.en: FRANKIE: Whenever we do a spell, we always cast a circle first.
translation.zh:
每当我们做一个咒语时
总是先做一个魔法圆圈.

translation.en: Think of it as, you know, making a container to hold all of our energies.
translation.zh:
你可以将其想象成制造一个
容纳我们所有能量的容器.

translation.en: And to keep the bad shit out.
Listen to the sound of the trees breathing along with you.
translation.zh: 听着树木和你一起呼吸的声音.

translation.en: Feel yourself rooted into the ground and into this moment.
translation.zh: 感觉自己扎根在地面上,进入了这一刻.

translation.en: FRANKIE, LOURDES & TABBY: The air, the fire, the water, the earth
The air, the fire, the water, the earth
ALL [CHANTING]: The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return.
The air, the fire, the water, the earth Return, return, return
LOURDES: Oh, my God! That was so fricking cool!

translation.zh: 不过那真是太不可思议了!
那是第三阶段,宝贝. 好,如果我们能够做到,接下来呢?

translation.en: TABBY: Okay, but if we could do that, now what should we do?
translation.zh: 好,如果我们能够做到,接下来呢?

translation.en: Why are we at Timmy's house? He's a terrorist.
translation.zh:
-我们为什么在提米家?
-他是恐怖分子.

translation.en: That's a little extreme. We don't wanna hurt him, though, right?
translation.zh: 那有点过火了.我们也不想伤害他吧?

translation.en: No, she's right. Hexing is serious.
translation.zh: 不,她说得对.诅咒太严重了.

translation.en: Everybody relax. We're not hexing him.
translation.zh: 大家放轻松.我们不会给他下诅咒.

translation.en: We'll just cast a spell to make him less of a garbage person.
translation.zh: 我们只是施法让他少点做个垃圾人.

translation.en: LILY: How do you know no one's home?
I'll take the lead on this one.
You guys, we shouldn't be doing this.
Okay, we need something from his physical person to cast the spell.
translation.zh: 好,我们需要来自他身体的物件来施法.

translation.en: No way. No way. Timmy full of surprises.
LOURDES: Naw, this boy has a Ouija board?
translation.zh: 不是吧,这男孩有显灵板？

translation.en: I think I found something from his physical person.
translation.zh: 我想我找到来自他身体的某些东西.

translation.en: Oh, no way. No. No. That is not a used--
Low-key kinda surprised he used a condom.
translation.zh: 适度的有点惊讶他用了避孕套.

translation.en: Frankie, don't touch that! Come on, it's...
It's definitely his most powerful element.
translation.zh: 这绝对是他最强大的元素.

translation.en: I hate to give it to her, but Frankie's kinda right, guys.
translation.zh: 我不想同意,但弗兰琪是对的,各位.

translation.en: Okay, what do I do? Rose oil.
Don't let it touch you, bro.
We call upon the Goddess of Holy Mysteries.
You're doin' it. In spirit and in body...
and in perfect love and perfect trust,
translation.zh: 并以完美的爱和完全的信任,

translation.en: LOURDES: Do it, girl. TABBY: Do it.
Get it. LOURDES: Get it on that pillow.
We gotta jump. We gotta jump. There's a clear shot out this window.
translation.zh:
-我们必须跳下去.
-可以从这窗口安全离开.

translation.en: It's our only option. Come on.
Can't you guys just make us fly or something?
translation.zh: 你们不能让我们飞起来什么的吗?

translation.en: MAN: Timmy, no video games until you finish your homework.
translation.zh: 提米,你完成功课前不准玩电子游戏.

translation.en: She taught us all to read auras.
translation.zh: 她教我们所有人阅读光环

translation.en: ALL [CHANTING]: The Maiden, The Mother, The Crone The Maiden, The Mother, The Crone
The Maiden, The Mother, The Crone
What you gonna do about it? What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 你打算怎么办?你要怎么做?

translation.en: I was starting to get a little worried.
translation.zh: 我开始有点担心. 对不起,我只是和朋友一起.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry, I was just hanging out with my friends.
translation.zh: 对不起,我只是和朋友一起.

translation.en: ADAM: Hey, Helen, is Lily up there with you?
translation.zh: 海伦,莉莉和你在一起吗?

translation.en: Listen, sweetie, we gotta talk about something.
translation.zh: 听好,甜心,我们有些事要谈谈.

translation.en: Um, I get back from a week away doing groups
translation.zh: 我刚从办公一星期回来

translation.en: and Jacob tells me you assaulted Timmy Andrews?
translation.zh: 雅各告诉我你袭击提米安德鲁斯?

translation.en: He said Timmy didn't lay a hand on you.
translation.zh: 他说提米根本没动到你.

translation.en: Well, he whispered something in my ear--
He whispered something so you hit him? Well, if you'd just let me finish--
translation.zh:
-他对你说了一些东西你就打他?
-如果你能让我说完...

translation.en: When I am speaking, please don't interrupt me.
Adam, let's take a step back here for a second, all right?
Well, I'm sure the circumstances were complicated, but...
translation.zh: 我相信情况是复杂的,但是...

translation.en: I have to have a zero-tolerance policy when it comes to violence.
translation.zh: 关于暴力,我必须采取零容忍政策.

translation.en: That's the way it's always been in this house. So...
translation.zh: 这家一直都是这样.所以...

translation.en: More than anything, I'm disappointed, Lily, in you.
translation.zh: 最重要的是,我对你很失望,莉莉.

translation.en: Wow. Way to stick it to the man, Mom. Lily.
HELEN: You just need to be more kind in the way that you speak to her.
translation.zh: 你只要对她说话时多点仁慈就好.

translation.en: ADAM: Yeah, discipline, it's all about kindness.
translation.zh: 是,纪律,这全都与仁慈有关.

translation.en: HELEN: That's not what I meant.
ADAM: She has an attitude, Helen. She comes in here all holier-than-thou.
translation.zh: 她有态度问题,海伦.她觉得得自己很棒.

translation.en: What are you doing out here? I just like to come here to think.
translation.zh:
-你为何在这里?
-我喜欢来这里思考.

translation.en: Get away from the noise. You know?
translation.zh: 离开那些纷扰.你知道吗?

translation.en: Listen, my dad can be strict but he does it out of love.
translation.zh: 我爸爸很严格,但他是出自于爱.

translation.en: I mean, there's a reason why he's gotten to where he has.
translation.zh: 他有今天的成就,肯定有他的原因.

translation.en: People travel from all over the world to hear him speak about this kind of stuff.
translation.zh: 人们从世界各处到来听他演讲这一类的东西.

translation.en: I don't even know his name.
translation.zh: 我连他的名字也不知道.

translation.en: NARRATOR [ON TV]: So you two wanna have sex.
At any moment, it is your right to say stop.
translation.zh: 在任何时候,你有权停止.

translation.en: Sure, if you wanna give him blue balls.
translation.zh: 当然,如果你想给他蓝色蛋蛋.

translation.en: NARRATOR: Consent is defined as an affirmative, unambiguous and a voluntary agreement.
translation.zh: 许可被定义为肯定,明确的自愿协议.

translation.en: So yes, and only yes, means yes.
translation.zh: 因此,好,只有好,才是真正的同意.

translation.en: Oh, my God, shut up, Jeremy.
Okay, thank you, Timmy. I'm sorry. It's super inappropriate.
translation.zh:
-好,谢谢你,提米.
-不,对不起.真的很不妥当.

translation.en: Can you please send him to the principal's office already?
translation.zh: 请你马上把他送去校长室吧?

translation.en: I mean, he's making so many people here uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 他让这里很多人很不舒服.

translation.en: JEREMY: Give me a break. I was joking.
translation.zh: 拜托.我只是开玩笑. 不,这让人感到不舒服,好吗?

translation.en: No, it can trigger a lot of shit for people, okay?
translation.zh: 不,这让人感到不舒服,好吗?

translation.en: So why don't you just try being a little bit more sensitive and just...
translation.zh: 所以为什么不尝试变得更加敏感...

translation.en: FRANKIE: Yo, he called himself cisgendered in seventh period today.
translation.zh: 今天第七节课时他称自己为顺位性别者.

translation.en: In eighth period, he went on a tear about heteronormativity.
translation.zh: 第八节课时,他为异性恋规范而哭了.

translation.en: I love that nail. That's fire.
translation.zh: 我好喜欢那个指甲.这很棒.

translation.en: Hey, listen. We don't know for sure that this Timmy stuff is because of us.
translation.zh: 听好.我们不肯定这提米的事是否因为我们.

translation.en: But all signs point to "it definitely is."
translation.zh: 但所有迹象显示"的确是."

translation.en: Well, we'll certainly see at his party tonight.
translation.zh: 我们肯定会在他家今晚的派对见到.

translation.en: But we need to proceed with caution.
translation.zh: 但是我们需要谨慎行事.

translation.en: Agreed. These kinds of spells are no joke.
translation.zh: 同意.这种法术可不是开玩笑.

translation.en: From now on, when it comes to Timmy,
translation.zh: 说到提米,我们所做的一切都必须先讨论,

translation.en: we need to talk through everything we do,
translation.zh: 说到提米,我们所做的一切都必须先讨论, 如何以及何时.好吗?

translation.en: how we do it and when. Okay?
♪ Keep it lit Your man get it ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的 祝你有个愉快的派对 我不会告诉亚当:) 爱你的,你妈妈
我不会告诉亚当:) 爱你的,你妈妈

translation.en: Hm? You got all that? Yeah. Yeah.
All right, well, enough with the melo. Picture time!
translation.zh: 好,别那么正经了.拍照时间!

translation.en: ♪ I play for keeps And you know I came to win ♪ Yeah, so, anyways... Oh, my God.
You know my favorite kind of movie?
translation.zh: 你知道我最喜欢哪一类电影吗?

translation.en: I'm gonna go to the bathroom.
Tampons are in the medicine cabinet.
It's super cool to shame other girls. You're the best!
translation.zh: 羞辱其他女孩真酷.你是最棒的!

translation.en: It's so sad that you, like, try to look pretty.
translation.zh: 太可悲了,你竟然试图变漂亮.

translation.en: Oh, my God. No, I'm fine. Honestly, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 天啊.不,我没事.坦白说,我没事.

translation.en: There's one just down the hall.
I mean, there's one in there, but it seems...
I think I owe you an apology.
What's the word I'm looking for?
I guess it has to do with power,
and me shaming you around something that's already pretty vulnerable, so...
translation.zh:
我在你本来
就很脆弱的地方羞辱你,所以...

translation.en: I guess what I'm trying to say is...

translation.zh: 是,我没事. 看,今晚我不喝酒,但如果你真的想要派对,

translation.en: I'm not drinking tonight, but if you really wanna party,
translation.zh: 看,今晚我不喝酒,但如果你真的想要派对,

translation.en: I've got this secret stash of LaCroix in the fridge downstairs.
translation.zh:
我在楼下的冰箱里
秘密藏了一堆LaCroix.

translation.en: I also compiled this super eclectic playlist, and I'm open to any requests.
translation.zh:
我还编了这个超级不拘一格的
播放列表,我接受任何要求.

translation.en: I think more than anything, tonight I really just wanna dance.
translation.zh: 我想无论是什么,今晚我只想跳舞.

translation.en: All right. Sorry. I'll scoot by.
I'm just gonna go ahead and say it. I'm really into Woke Timmy.
translation.zh: 我就直接说吧.我真的很喜欢觉醒的提米.

translation.en: LOURDES: Lily's right. We have to be really careful.
translation.zh: 莉莉说得对.我们必须非常小心.

translation.en: We've never used a dude's-- Okay, don't. Oh.
translation.zh:
-我们从没用过一个男性...
-好,别说.

translation.en: You don't have to remind me.
I mean, I just love her politics, you know?
translation.zh: 我非常喜爱她的政见,你知道吗?

绝对是. 就是她运用艺术技巧
处理种族和性别政治的方式

translation.en: I mean, just the way she uses her artistry to deal with race politics and gender politics
translation.zh:
就是她运用艺术技巧
处理种族和性别政治的方式

translation.en: and still just makes, like, the sickest pop jams.
translation.zh: 同时还作了最棒的歌曲.

translation.en: I read this interview with Janet Mock--
translation.zh: 我读过珍妮特莫克的访谈...

translation.en: Oh, let me get you a glass.
Chivalrous. Wow, the bar is that low, huh?
I don't know. My mom gave it to me when I was little.
translation.zh: 我不知道.我小时妈妈给我的.

translation.en: My mom gave me a necklace too.
translation.zh: 我妈妈也给了我一条项链.

translation.en: Guess it's a thing, you know? Moms and necklaces.
translation.zh: 看来是常有的事.妈妈和项链.

translation.en: I used to think it was kinda whack, but...
translation.zh: 我曾经以为这有点怪,但是...

translation.en: It's a nice thing, ever since she died, to just remember her by.
translation.zh: 它是个好东西,她死了之后,就用来纪念她.

translation.en: When did she...? When I was 11.
Can I tell you something kind of embarrassing?
translation.zh: 我可以告诉你一些尴尬事吗?

translation.en: I still talk to her. Or try to.
translation.zh: 我还一样和她说话.或尝试.

translation.en: I know that's kind of woo-woo or whatever, but, um...
translation.zh: 我知道那大概是鬼神之说什么的,但是...

translation.en: I have this Ouija board from when I was a kid, and, um...
translation.zh: 但是我小时候就有这个显灵板,而且...

translation.en: I use it sometimes to try...
I don't think that's embarrassing at all. Okay.
translation.zh: 我认为那一点也不尴尬.

translation.en: I mean, if I'd lost my mom, I'd do the same thing.
translation.zh: 如果我失去妈妈,也会如此.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. What did she say?
She told me to clean my room.
No. Yeah. Like, she really did.
That must've taken a really long time to spell out on a Ouija board.
translation.zh: 要在显灵板上阐明,应该花很长时间.

translation.en: It was definitely, like, a good five minutes
translation.zh: 肯定的,大约有整整5分钟之久.

translation.en: Lily, you need to come right now. It's a party.
translation.zh: 莉莉,你必须马上过来.这是派对.

translation.en: Yo, dude, we need to talk about our science project.
translation.zh: 老兄,我们必须讨论我们的科学计划.

translation.en: Are you coming to eat with us or what? Yeah. Yeah.
JACOB: You still staying for dinner?
Yeah, I mean, if it's cool with you.
Wait, let's all hang together. Yeah?
translation.zh: 等等,我们一起聊天吧.好吗?

translation.en: Look, we can do this stuff in an hour. Let's just hang out with the girls.
translation.zh:
我们一小时就能完成这东西
和女孩们聊天吧.

translation.en: Yeah, no, I'm good. You go ahead. Wait, you sure?
translation.zh:
-不,我不要.你去吧.
-等等,你肯定?

translation.en: So you've really never played Two Truths One Lie before?
translation.zh: 你之前真的从来没玩过二实话一个谎言？

translation.en: FRANKIE: Are you sure we shouldn't check with Jacob one more time?
translation.zh: 你肯定我们不该再问雅各一次?

translation.en: FRANKIE: Maybe he changed his mind.
Okay, who wants to go first?
And then, like, maybe we could make this a Spin the Bottle situation.
translation.zh: 然后,也许我们可以把这变成转瓶游戏.

translation.en: I'll go first. I'll go first. Thank you.
I wish I had more Black friends.
translation.zh: 我希望我能有更多黑人朋友.

translation.en: I am scared for my brother's safety every day.
translation.zh: 我每天都担心我弟弟的安危.

translation.en: Wait, you don't like Beyoncé? No, bitch.
So my mom gave me this.
That's a lie. You don't know.
TIMMY: You don't know. You don't.
I'm sorry. I don't know why...
I've never told anyone this before.
translation.zh: 我从来没有告诉过任何人.

translation.en: Have you and Isaiah ever talked about it?
translation.zh: 你和以赛亚是否曾经谈过?

translation.en: He won't even look at me since it happened.
translation.zh: 事情发生后他根本没正视过我.

translation.en: It's felt good when it's been with girls as well, so...
translation.zh: 和女生们一起时感觉也很好,所以...

translation.en: I feel like there's no room to be...
Everyone just assumes you're just gay, and that's fine.
translation.zh: 大家只会觉得你就是同性恋,那也可以. 你知道,这根本没有错.

translation.en: You know, there's nothing wrong with that at all.

translation.zh: 我两个都喜欢.你了解吗?

translation.en: Oh, shit. You guys gotta leave.
Wait, what? LILY: I'm sorry. He's gonna kill us if he hears us.
translation.zh:
-等等,什么?
-抱歉.他会杀了我们,如果他...

translation.en: Look, I'll go distract him. Okay?
Isaiah told you he's not coming home for dinner?
translation.zh: 以赛亚说他不回来吃晚餐?

translation.en: Yeah, he went out. I don't know.
translation.zh: 是的,他出门了.我不知道.

translation.en: It was real good. Thanks for asking.
Made some real breakthroughs in some of my groups.
translation.zh: 我的一些小组取得了一些真正的突破.

translation.en: There's a lot of pain for these men
translation.zh: 这些男人面对极大的痛苦

translation.en: Mm. Here, let me help. It's fine.
As this garment glows in light,
I draw you closer to me this night.
Hi, I was just wondering if I left my sweatshirt in here.
translation.zh: 嗨,我在想我是否把我的运动衫留在这里.

translation.en: No. No, I don't think so.
No, I'm, um... I'm, um, meditating.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to interrupt...
I just wanna say, um, thank you.
I just feel like a massive...
Like I can just finally be myself.

translation.zh: 如果那样说有意义的话.

translation.en: Timmy, Jacob's been calling for you.
Um, I was just looking for my sweatshirt.
Isaiah. Are you sleepwalking again? Come on.
ISAIAH: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
Let's get you back to bed.
Okay, uh... Um, quiet down, please.
I have some very difficult news
translation.zh: 我有一些非常不好的消息

translation.en: to share with you this morning.
This morning, Timmy Andrews was found dead in his bedroom.
translation.zh: 今早,提米安德鲁被发现死在他的卧室里.

translation.en: The cause of death is believed to have been suicide.
Do you think that we're sort of responsible?
translation.zh: 你们觉得我们是否要负责任?

translation.en: It's, like, he told us this huge secret.
translation.zh: 他把一个重大秘密告诉了我们.

translation.en: This huge secret that he clearly was not ready to deal with.
translation.zh: 他显然还没有准备好应对这个巨大的秘密.

translation.en: He came to my room last night.
He told me he felt like a weight lifted.
translation.zh: 他说他觉得卸下了一个重担.

translation.en: This is stupid, but I did this, like, love spell
translation.zh: 这很蠢,但我下了这个爱情咒语

translation.en: and then he came right into my room and he--
translation.zh: 然后他就直接进来我的房间...

-什么?
-他吻了我. 他之前已经被施了法.

translation.en: He was-- He was already under the influence of a spell.
Was all of this just like some game to you?
translation.zh: 这一切对你来说像一些游戏吗?

translation.en: What? All of this work that we did together
was about building trust, about building community
translation.zh: 是为了建立信任,建设社区

translation.en: and not letting some stupid crush get in the way of everything we've--
translation.zh:
以及不让一些愚蠢的迷恋
阻碍我们的所有...

translation.en: I think we should take a break from magick.
translation.zh: 看来我们应该暂停试用魔法.

translation.en: If we're not gonna use our power responsibly,
translation.zh: 如果我们不能对我们的能力负责任,

translation.en: then we shouldn't be using it at all.
ADAM: I wanna talk today about weakness.
Because when one of us is weak...
translation.zh: 因为当我们其中一个很弱...

translation.en: But how do we alchemize weakness into sovereign power?
translation.zh: 但我们如何将弱点化为主权力量呢?

translation.en: How do we eliminate the weakest among us so that the strongest can thrive?
translation.zh: 我们如何消除最弱者,使最强者能够成功?

translation.en: You all know my son Jacob.
translation.zh: 你们都认识我儿子雅各.

translation.en: My son lost a friend today.
translation.zh: 今天我儿子失去了一个朋友.

translation.en: No. No, we all face tragedy every day.
translation.zh: 不.不,我们每天都面对着悲剧.

translation.en: The question is, how do we face it?
translation.zh: 问题是,我们该如何面对?

translation.en: for being so tough on you.
You know, it wasn't always so easy for me, raising three boys on my own.
translation.zh: 一直以来,我也不容易,独身养育三个儿子.

translation.en: I had to set very strict rules and keep 'em in line.
translation.zh: 我必须设定非常严格的规则让他们保持一致.

translation.en: I know that's not how you and your mom operate...
translation.zh: 我知道你和你妈并没用这一套,所以...

translation.en: I wanted to say that I'm sorry.
I know you were close to Timmy too.
translation.zh: 我知道你也和提米交情不浅.

translation.en: I saw you checking out the old family crest, huh?
translation.zh: 我看到你对家族徽章有兴趣.

translation.en: It's actually pretty cool. These go back centuries.
translation.zh: 它还蛮酷的.这些可以追溯到几个世纪以前.

translation.en: You know, um, snakes are usually considered scary or dangerous,
translation.zh: 蛇通常被认为是恐怖或危险的,

translation.en: but actually in pagan culture, they were symbols of rebirth.
translation.zh: 但实际上在异教文化中,它们是重生的象征.

translation.en: Anyway, it's getting late. To be continued.
We're not safe here. Wait, listen.
translation.zh:
-我们在这里不安全.
-等等,听我说.

translation.en: Take a breath. Tell me what happened.
translation.zh: 深呼吸.告诉我发生什么事.

translation.en: Adam. I'm telling you. What? Did something happen?
translation.zh:
-亚当.我告诉你.
-什么?发生什么事了吗?

translation.en: And I saw... He had a...
I just really think we need to go.
translation.zh: 我真的认为我们必须离开.

translation.en: I just really think we should go.
translation.zh: 我真的认为我们必须离开.

translation.en: Honestly, Lily, you are going through a lot right now.
translation.zh: 坦白说,莉莉,你现在正在经历很多事情.

translation.en: Let us go somewhere new. Huh? Let's just take a road trip, just take a weekend,
translation.zh:
我们去一个新地方.
让我们来个公路旅行,就一个周末,

translation.en: just the two of us, somewhere cool, somewhere fun.
translation.zh: 就我们两个,去一些很酷,好玩的地方.

translation.en: We just need to make it through the funeral.
translation.zh: 我们只需要通过葬礼就可以了.

translation.en: There's gotta be something here that proves it.
translation.zh: 这里一定有能够证明的东西.

translation.en: It's complicated. No, it's really not.
It's, like, a simple conversation that should have happened a long time ago.
translation.zh: 就如一个很久前就该有的简单对话.

translation.en: No. You don't-- Hold on. Hold on. No.
It wasn't entirely up to me.
Oh, really? Who else would it have been up to, Mom?
translation.zh: 真的?那么取决于谁呢,妈?

translation.en: It was the one condition that she had,
that I never reveal to you, and she's...
translation.zh: 就是我永远不告诉你真相,而她...

translation.en: She didn't want you to know that you were adopted,
translation.zh: 她不想你知道你是被领养的,

translation.en: and I made a promise to her and...
Why would she want that? 'Cause she...
I was assigned to her at the crisis center here and...
translation.zh: 我在这里的危机中心被分配给她...

translation.en: You guys, I need to talk to you.
I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.zh: 我不觉得那是个好主意.

translation.en: There's no one else I can trust.
translation.zh: 已经没有我能够相信的人了.

translation.en: I need to take her away from here.
I need to put her first.
LOURDES: You guys, she's not gonna harm anyone. She already did.
translation.zh:
-姐妹们,她不会伤害任何人.
-她已经做了.

translation.en: She's just going through some shit.
translation.zh: 她只是在经历一些事情.

translation.en: Yeah, well, what happened to our number one rule of the craft?
translation.zh: 那么我们的第一巫术规则呢?

translation.en: If a person is a danger to herself or others, they will be bound.
translation.zh:
如果一个人对自己
或他人构成威胁,他们将被约束.
她不负责任地使用自己的能力.

translation.en: But, like, are we any better, though?
translation.zh: 但是,我们也没好到哪里去吧?

translation.en: I mean, like, what we did to Timmy.
translation.zh: 例如我们对提米做的事.

translation.en: Well, then maybe we should bind ourselves too.
translation.zh: 那也许我们也应该约束自己.

translation.en: We are bound to each other
We prevent ourselves from doing harm.
translation.zh: 我们防止自己造成伤害.

translation.en: We relinquish our powers from this day forth.
translation.zh: 从今天起,我们放弃我们的能力.

translation.en: I never should've brought you here.
translation.zh: 我根本不该带你来这里.

translation.en: But I need you to agree to one thing.
translation.zh: 但我需要你同意一件事.

translation.en: Whatever this is, whatever's happening here...
translation.zh: 无论如何,无论这里发生什么事...

translation.en: I need you to stop it.
Not just about your birth mother, but about...
Whatever you call them, Lily, they're-- You knew?
translation.zh:
-无论你如何称呼它们,莉莉,它们...
-你早已知道?

translation.en: that your legacy was a curse.
And that the second they came online, I would have to stop them in their tracks, so Lily--
translation.zh:
当你的力量显现出来的那一刻
我应该马上制止它.

translation.en: let me take the burden for you.
Let me take your curse so you don't have to carry it.
translation.zh: 让我带走你的诅咒,你就不用承担.

translation.en: It has been so painful, you can't imagine...
to watch you understand that you were different and not know why.
translation.zh: 看着你知道自己的不同却不了解原因.

translation.en: Now you can see why your difference...
translation.zh: 现在你可以了解为何你的不同...

translation.en: But I need you to say it with me, Lily.
translation.zh: 但我需要你跟着我说,莉莉.

translation.en: My mother would never tell me my difference is dangerous.
translation.zh: 我母亲不会说我的不同会很危险.

translation.en: Those don't seem to be working anymore.

translation.zh: 多亏了你所谓的朋友们.

translation.en: You see, that's the thing about girls with power, Lily.
translation.zh: 你看,那些有能力的女孩就是这样,莉莉.

translation.en: They're always too weak not to use it against each other.
translation.zh: 她们总是太弱了,以至于不能互相对抗.

translation.en: What do you want from me?
translation.zh: 你想从我这里得到什么?

translation.en: She's tied up at the moment.
Well, she's tied up too, in a different way.
translation.zh: 她也被绑起来了,以不同的方式.

translation.en: You know, she fought it at first,
You see, Lily, in order to gain a witch's power, she has to give them up voluntarily.
translation.zh:
莉莉,为了获得女巫的力量
她必须自愿放弃.

translation.en: So you do have a choice here.
We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
translation.zh: 我们可以用容易或困难的方法.

translation.en: You'll have to kill me first.

translation.zh: "姐妹情"里没有一个会被遗漏,宝贝.

translation.en: There is definitely an I in "sisterhood." FRANKIE: You get my meaning.
translation.zh:
-"姐妹情"里没有孤单.
-你明白我的意思的.

translation.en: What we were saying was.... We're sorry.
We love you, and we unbind you, Lily.
translation.zh: 我们爱你,我们解除了你的约束,莉莉.

translation.en: You girls ought to be careful in the woods at night.
translation.zh: 你们夜里在森林里要小心.

translation.en: A lot of weirdos out here.
You see, Lily, power is order.
It belongs in the hands of those who understand it.
It's been that way for thousands of years.
translation.zh: 几千年以来一直都是这样.

translation.en: Timmy's a good example of that.
Until you tried to make him in your own image.
So then I had to kill him...
Because we are not in your image.
translation.zh: 因为我们不在你的形象中.

translation.en: We are your rulers and kings.
translation.zh: 我们是你的统治者和国王.

translation.en: and I'm gonna watch you burn.
Where do you think you're going?
GIRLS [CHANTING]: Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire.
Now it's your turn to burn.

translation.zh: 过后再传简讯给我们,好吗?

translation.en: How's the warlock dating pool treatin' ya? Are you steering clear?
translation.zh: 和术士们约会还好吗?你有敬而远之吗?

translation.en: But, also, not really because we almost did die.
translation.zh: 但也不完全是的,因为我们差点死了.

translation.en: All right, let's hit the road, baby girl.
translation.zh: 好,我们上路吧,宝贝女孩.

translation.en: LILY: Love you. FRANKIE: I love you.
